Jx.Plugin.Grid.Prelighter

Extends: Jx.Plugin

Grid plugin to prelight rows, columns, and cells

Inspired by the original code in Jx.Grid

License

Original Copyright © 2008, DM Solutions Group Inc.  This version Copyright © 2009, Jon Bomgardner.

Summary
Jx.Plugin.Grid.PrelighterExtends: Jx.Plugin
Options
celldefaults to false.
rowdefaults to false.
columndefaults to false.
rowHeaderdefaults to false.
columnHeaderdefaults to false.
Functions
initconstruct a new instance of the plugin.
attachSets up the plugin and connects it to the grid
detach
activateAllows programatic access to turning prelighting on.
deactivateAllows programatic access to turning prelighting off.

Options

cell

defaults to false.  If set to true, the cell under the mouse is highlighted as the mouse moves.

row

defaults to false.  If set to true, the row under the mouse is highlighted as the mouse moves.

column

defaults to false.  If set to true, the column under the mouse is highlighted as the mouse moves.

rowHeader

defaults to false.  If set to true, the row header of the row under the mouse is highlighted as the mouse moves.

columnHeader

defaults to false.  If set to true, the column header of the column under the mouse is highlighted as the mouse moves.

Functions

init

init: function()

construct a new instance of the plugin.  The plugin must be attached to a Jx.Grid instance to be useful though.

attach

attach: function (grid)

Sets up the plugin and connects it to the grid

detach

detach: function()

activate

activate: function (opt)

Allows programatic access to turning prelighting on.

Parameters

optthe option to turn on.  One of ‘cell’, ‘row’, ‘rowHeader’, ‘column’, or ‘columnHeader’

deactivate

deactivate: function (opt)

Allows programatic access to turning prelighting off.

Parameters

optthe option to turn off.  One of ‘cell’, ‘row’, ‘rowHeader’, ‘column’, or ‘columnHeader’

Sets up the plugin and connects it to the grid

Allows programatic access to turning prelighting on.
